content: magic_ring n courage mint is the perfect little gift for a friend or loved one who needs a pick-me-up to uplift their spirits and give them hope to carry on project uses just single_crochet small amount of size 3 yarn and a small amount of basic craft supplies all detailed in the video tutorial magic_ring n courage mint is a quick and easy project that works up in less than 10 rounds and turns out about 3 in diameter in the video tutorial you l l be taken through each step of the project showing you how to create the white circle using a simple technique that eliminates unsightly gaps and then how to add the red stripes with an easy color changing technique that makes for clean lines video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=cirqiwrbwqo plus you ll learn how to add the eyes mouth arms legs and special messages which are found in a free printable on my website www celticknotcrochet com
